(Program
{+(For
    (Identifier)
    (Other "in"
      (Identifier))
    (Identifier))+}
{+(For
    (Identifier)
    (Identifier)
    (Other "in"
      (Identifier))
    (Identifier))+}
  (For
  { (Identifier)
  ->(Identifier) }
    (Other "in"
    {+(RangeExpression
        (IntegerLiteral)
        (Other "..")
        (IntegerLiteral))+}
    {-(ArrayLiteral
        (IntegerLiteral)
        (IntegerLiteral)
        (IntegerLiteral))-})
  { (MethodCall
      (Identifier)
      (Identifier))
  ->(Boolean) })
{+(For
    (Identifier)
    (Identifier)
    (Other "in"
      (RangeExpression
        (IntegerLiteral)
        (Other "..")
        (IntegerLiteral)))
    (Boolean))+})
